title: Beautiful 1 bed/1ba in Great Lake Merritt Location AVL 8/1 F204
posting_body: 1 Bedroom Facing Lake Merritt Available August 1
*Virtual tour is of same layout and remodel, but 2 floors higher.
* $2,595 lease written price, $200/month concession sent via check each month for the duration of the initial lease*
An intimate 16-unit building directly across the street from Lakeshore Park.
Every apartment has sweeping balcony views of Lake Merritt and downtown Oakland.
Ten minute walk to Lake Merritt BART.
Security features include keypad entry, controlled elevator access, video surveillance, and on-site building manager.
Select apartments feature new hardwood and tile floors, granite countertops, upgraded appliances and gas range.
Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs Welcome (See Details Below)
Pet: $75-100 added to the base month per pet
Water and garbage are passed through based on occupancy and usage.
Attached garage parking is available for an additional monthly fee.
Smoking is not permitted on the premises.
*Photos and videos of similar unit to show finishes being used in this space*
Rent: $$2,595 lease written price, $200/month concession sent via check each month for the duration of the initial lease
